itemDescription: Welsh rugby union footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Michael Owen (born 7 November 1980 in Pontypridd), is a former Welsh international rugby union player, who most often played Number 8, but was also versatile enough to play flanker or even lock. His ball handling was arguably his greatest asset.

response: Michael Owen is an English former footballer.
Michael Owen may also refer to:
*Sir Michael Owen (psychiatrist) (fl. 1977–2020), Welsh research scientist in the area of neurology
*Michael Owen (rugby union) (born 1980), Welsh rugby union player
